alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Santa Clarita Valley; Western San Fernando Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 11 at 5:11AM PDT until October 12 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Areas of northwest to north winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 40 to 45 mph are expected, shifting to northeast late tonight and Thursday morning. There will be local gusts to 50 mph in the foothills, and in the eastern Santa Monica mountains. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area and Western San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to noon PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Santa Clarita Valley; Western San Fernando Valley
